item.title: La voiture électrique chinoise à moins de 30 000 € se montre avec une version encore plus performante et ça donne envie
item.description: Nio ne veut pas faire oublier sa petite voiture électrique à moins de 30 000 euros commercialisée en Chine. Une version rally vient d'être dévoilée en Chine, ainsi que l'arrivée de la marque dans d'autres pays européens. La France reste boudée pour le moment.

item.title: AirDropping stuff from a Pixel phone rules so much
item.description: It's pretty rare when a cool new gadget feature gets announced that you can try right away on your own devices. But that's exactly what happened yesterday when, out of the blue, Google announced it had engineered a way to bring AirDrop interoperability to Pixel 10 phones - all without Apple's involvement. After the news […]

item.title: A Computer Science Professor Invented the Emoticon After a Joke Went Wrong
item.description: In 1982, Carnegie Mellon University professor Scott Fahlman suggested using :-) for humorous comments after his colleagues took a joke about mercury seriously.

item.title: NordPass Review: An Almost Flawless Password Manager
item.description: NordPass is swift and packed with features, but the lack of support for TOTP code storage puts it slightly behind the competition.

item.title: The new silicon valley (literally)
item.description: Arizona's economy was once dominated by the "five C's": cotton, cattle, citrus, copper, and climate. But a new C has emerged that could grow to overshadow the rest: chips. New semiconductor manufacturing facilities are springing up across the greater Phoenix area, stretching across blocks of new roads with names like "Processor Parkway" and "Transistor Terrace." […]...

item.title: I tried this simple speed camera and hazard tracker – and it’s the affordable, screen-less copilot I’ve been looking for
item.description: The Ooono Co-Driver NO2 brings reliable speed camera and road hazard warnings, without the distracting visuals.

item.description: Here's our guide on how to watch The Ashes 2025-26 highlights on BBC iPlayer from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Jon M. Chu wants to ‘entertain the hell’ out of people
item.description: The director of ‘Wicked: For Good,’ part two of his epic screen version of the Broadway hit, can get you to put your phone down. All it requires is a trip to the movies. Before Wicked opened on Broadway in October 2003, the musical’s production team took the show to the Curran Theatre in San Francisco for what’s called an “out of town tryout.” The five-week run allowed the producers, writers, and director to work out the kinks ahead of the show’s Broadway debut....

item.title: Android 16 et IA générative : Nothing OS 4.0 débarque avec une avalanche de nouveautés
item.description: Nothing déploie officiellement sa nouvelle interface, Nothing OS 4.0. Propulsée par Android 16, cette mise à jour majeure mise sur la personnalisation par l’intelligence artificielle, des animations retravaillées et une extension des fonctionnalités de l’interface Glyph.
